gallery.title: Discover Our Latest and Essential University Course Books
gallery.subtitle: University Course Book Gallery

galleryItem.title: Introduction to Algorithms
galleryItem.subtitle: Computer Science - MIT
galleryItem.content: An essential guide to understanding algorithms, data structures, and their applications in programming.

detailList.title: A foundational textbook in computer science.
In-depth coverage of algorithms and data structures.

galleryItem.title: Calculus: Early Transcendentals
galleryItem.subtitle: Mathematics - University of Toronto
galleryItem.content: A comprehensive textbook that covers differential and integral calculus, designed for university students.

detailList.title: Widely used in university-level calculus courses.
Clear explanations of fundamental calculus concepts.

galleryItem.title: Fundamentals of Physics
galleryItem.subtitle: Physics - Harvard University
galleryItem.content: A comprehensive introduction to the key principles of physics, including mechanics, thermodynamics, and electromagnetism.

detailList.title: A key textbook for university physics students.
Incorporates a broad range of physics topics.

galleryItem.title: Engineering Mechanics: Dynamics
galleryItem.subtitle: Engineering - Stanford University
galleryItem.content: A textbook focused on the principles of dynamics, including kinematics and kinetics of particles and rigid bodies.

detailList.title: Covers the fundamental concepts of dynamics.
Widely used in mechanical and civil engineering courses.

galleryItem.title: Discrete Mathematics and Its Applications
galleryItem.subtitle: Computer Science - UC Berkeley
galleryItem.content: A comprehensive book for learning discrete mathematics, including logic, set theory, combinatorics, and graph theory.

detailList.title: Key textbook for computer science students.
Offers clear examples and explanations of mathematical concepts.

galleryItem.title: Introduction to Quantum Mechanics
galleryItem.subtitle: Physics - MIT
galleryItem.content: An introductory text on quantum mechanics, aimed at university students with a background in classical mechanics and basic mathematics.

detailList.title: A widely used textbook in introductory quantum mechanics.
Thorough coverage of key topics like wave functions and operators.

galleryItem.title: Strength of Materials
galleryItem.subtitle: Engineering - Purdue University
galleryItem.content: A key textbook in materials science, focusing on stress, strain, and the properties of materials under various forces.

detailList.title: Essential for students of mechanical and civil engineering.
Covers the study of stress, strain, and deformation of materials.
